headline: American Tower (NYSE:AMT) Confirms Deloitte & Declares US$1.70 Dividend
summary: American Tower (NYSE:AMT) recently made headlines with its decision to approve Deloitte & Touche LLP as its independent auditor, while consistently maintaining shareholder value through dividends, recently reaffirmed at $1.70 per share. Over the last quarter, the company's stock achieved an 11.8% rise, aligning with a broader upward market movement, especially given the S&P 500's substantial gains. Additionally, positive earnings presentations, including solid quarterly revenue, demonstrated...
